component.name: XBPlay: Remote Play for Xbox
component.summary: Remote play from your console or xCloud

description.p: Remote play from your Xbox One or Series X/S game console directly to your Linux device. This app supports 1080p quality, playing backward compatible games, and xCloud titles. Haptic feedback is also supported on connected controllers. The XBPlay app is available on Google Play, Google Play TV, the iOS App Store, and the Amazon Marketplace (TV).

ul.li: xHome: Stream content to your device and control it with a mini on screen gamepad or connected controller. Stream in 1080p resolution and Xbox One backwards compatible games (360 games).
xCloud: Remote play Xbox games with the xCloud service. (Requires a Xbox GamePass subscription).
Controller Builder: Create and save your very own custom touch controls for in-game play.
Physical Controller: All streaming screens will work with a physical controller connected to your device. We have even tested playing a Xbox game with a PS5 controller!

description.p: Fix bug on steam deck that locked the resolution to 1280x800 on external monitors. Any resolution can be used now.
Added ability to create xCloud shortcuts for all platforms if steam app is installed (not just steam decks).
Fix white screen issue on some linux devices
Allow xCloud from unsupported regions without VPN, icon update, fullscreen fix.
Fix bug preventing xCloud shortcut prompts from showing. Allow window drag.
Enhanced login flow by addressing 2FA and repeated password prompt issues. Resolved Steam Deck new user bug.
Improved steam deck xCloud artwork functionality.
Updated from Discord/Reddit suggestions. Including input lag fix and making most of the UI elements work without touch.
Added feature to add xCloud titles directly to steam deck library.
Fix controller input for steam deck.
